title: Game Progress Route
content:
Illithid will reveal that they were in fact your Dream Visitor and ask for help in defeating the Githyanki warriors. You'll have the following options when responding to it's request:

What do you need me to do? Leave the githyanki alone! Prove to me that your are who you say. This is the battle you were fighting? I don't believe you. You're a mind flayer. Die, monster!
